Sentencas: In this communication, the electrical conductivities and thermal expansion studies of microwave sintered co-doped ceria Ce0.8Y0.2-xDyxO2-delta (x = 0, 0.05, 0.10, 0.15 and 0.20) solid electrolyte materials for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFCs) synthesized by sol-gel auto-combustion method were discussed.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of Y and Dy co-doped ceria solid electrolytes for IT-SOFCs: a microwave sintering

Sentencas: Microwave sintering at 1300 degrees C for 30 min was used for making dense powder compacts.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of Y and Dy co-doped ceria solid electrolytes for IT-SOFCs: a microwave sintering

Sentencas: The relative densities of all the samples are noticed above 95%.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of Y and Dy co-doped ceria solid electrolytes for IT-SOFCs: a microwave sintering

Sentencas: Raman spectrum was characterized by the presence of a very strong band near 460 cm(-1), which along with X-ray diffraction (XRD) analysis ascertain the sample formation with a single-phase cubic fluorite structure.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of Y and Dy co-doped ceria solid electrolytes for IT-SOFCs: a microwave sintering

Sentencas: The lattice parameter values were calculated from XRD patterns.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of Y and Dy co-doped ceria solid electrolytes for IT-SOFCs: a microwave sintering

Sentencas: SEM images show nearly uniform grains with distinct grain boundaries.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of Y and Dy co-doped ceria solid electrolytes for IT-SOFCs: a microwave sintering

Sentencas: The thermal expansion coefficients (TECs) are found to vary linearly with temperature and were measured in the range from 14.15 to 13.20 x 10(-6) degrees C-1.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of Y and Dy co-doped ceria solid electrolytes for IT-SOFCs: a microwave sintering

Sentencas: The investigation on total ionic conductivity (TIC) was executed with variation in dopant concentration and relative oxygen vacancies.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of Y and Dy co-doped ceria solid electrolytes for IT-SOFCs: a microwave sintering

Sentencas: The impedance analysis reveals that the sample Ce0.80Y0.10Dy0.10O2-delta displays the highest TIC, i.e., 7.5 x 10(-3) S center dot cm(-1) at 500 degrees C and minimum activation energy 0.90 eV compared to others.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of Y and Dy co-doped ceria solid electrolytes for IT-SOFCs: a microwave sintering

Sentencas: With the highest TIC and minimum activation energy, the Ce0.80Y0.10Dy0.10O2-delta might be the possible material as the solid electrolyte in intermediate temperature SOFCs.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of Y and Dy co-doped ceria solid electrolytes for IT-SOFCs: a microwave sintering
